May 15, 1920 D Penygroes Contest (Class B)
Penygroes Contest (Class B) 20 Test Piece Contest Penygroes Contest penygroes-contest-class-b
None
Recollections of England
Brynycwar Grounds, Penygroes, Llanelli, Carmarthenshire Prizes - 1st £10 and shield, 2nd £4, 3rd £2. Best cornet, trombone and euphonium - Ammanford. 3 bands competed.
Oct. 12, 2018, 8:49 p.m. Oct. 12, 2018, 8:52 p.m.
1 Ammanford Silver Band D. H. Thomas
2 Pontyberem United D. Williams
3 Pontardulais Town Band Ernest Pritchard
